str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
And, even, also, namely.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To search diligently, examine. Apparently from ereo; to seek, i.e. to investigate.
A kidney (as a general emotional center), the reins. Of uncertain affinity; a kidney, i.e. the inmost mind.
And, even, also, namely.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
